text: Aap say fatwa poochtay hain aap keh dijiye kay Allah Taalaa (khud) tumhen kalala kay baray mein fatwa deta hai. Agar koi shaks marr jaye jiss ki aulad na ho aur aik behan ho to uss kay liye choray huye maal ka aadha hissa hai aur woh bhai uss behan ka waris hoga agar uss ki aulad na ho. Pus agar behnen do hon to unhen kul choray huye ka do tehaee milay ga. Aur agar koi shaks iss natay kay hain mard bhi aur aurten bhi to mard kay liye hissa hai misil do aurton kay Allah Taalaa tumharay liye biyan farma raha hai kay aisa na ho kay tum behak jao aur Allah Taalaa her cheez say waqif hai
